stories.text: Hello i recently had to sell my laptop, since then i've been web developing on my phone, every thing i do in the browser works pretty well, i use Acode it even has chrome like console and tools, but if i want to use nodejs with npm everything goes to hell i use Termux and i installed all dependencies the package needs still nothing. Have u tried it, and did it work if yes tell me how pls?
stories.title: Ask HN: Having Problems with Node.js on Termux

Crypto links with banks pose threat to financial stability, says ECB

stories.text:
I joined this company that has a public image of a well put together company. They have a range of products with a fairly large user-base (in the few millions).

However, once inside I find that each product is kept together by a skeleton crew or sometimes by people who can only work on it part time since they're handling multiple projects.

It feels like the bus factor for most projects is one (or very close to one).

I don't know how I feel about the situation, and management response to my question/concerns "it is what it is".

Do you think this is a huge red flag?
stories.title: Ask HN: What to do when the company is stretched thin?
